Title: The Art of War
Description:
Lok'tar Ogar, old friend. It has been too long since last we spoke.

It is good to see that you emerged safely from the depths of Vashj'ir.

I am stationed here in Grommash Hold.

All in service to the Horde are to swear allegiance to their new Warchief.

You would do well not to keep him waiting, $n.
ObjectivesText: Speak to General Nazgrim in Grommash Hold in Orgrimmar.
